data.title: Demographic reports from mySidewalk
data.meta_description: These mySidewalk reports help generate a better understanding of the people, housing, and jobs within our community.
data.text:
These mySidewalk reports help generate a better understanding of the people, housing and jobs within our community.

Data, charts and graphics are provided below on various city population topics, including count, age, gender, family size, race/ethnicity and language spoken at home. Housing data is also included that describes the age of homes, value, rental percentage and vacancy status. Finally, income and employment data provide insight into household income, poverty, number and types of jobs, and unemployment.

Sources for these reports include US Census Bureau 2017-2021 American Community Survey (ACS), Longitudinal Employer-Household Dynamics (LEHD), LEHD Origin-Destination Employment Statistics (LODES) and the Quarterly Consensus of Employment and Wages (QCEW).
